full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO'I ZHI RGYAS KYI SBYIN SREG BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B CES DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO'I ZHE RGYAS KYI SBYIN SREG GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU DKOD PA 'DI'ANG ^GONG MA'I BLON CHEN DANG STOBS KYIS PHYUG PA WANG GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^DAM PA'I MING 'DZIN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS BGYIS PA BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
